title: Bob Irvine
text:
Robert (Bob) Samuel John Irvine is a New Zealand former <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who represented <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">New Zealand</a>.
Playing career.
Irvine played at halfback for <a href="Canterbury%20rugby%20league%20team">Canterbury</a> and the <a href="South%20Island%20rugby%20league%20team">South Island</a>. He played for the South Island in their 1963 match against <a href="South%20Africa%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">South Africa</a>.
In 1965, Irvine made his debut for <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">New Zealand</a>, becoming <a href="List%20of%20New%20Zealand%20Kiwis%20representatives">Kiwi #442</a>. Irvine went on to play in seven test matches for New Zealand.
Irvine won the <a href="New%20Zealand%20Rugby%20League">New Zealand Rugby League</a>'s player of the year award in 1968.
